Read our guide to put yourself in the picture. </description>     <dc:date>2014-04-24T11:05:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/who-is-britain2019s-biggest-2018cultural-icon2019">     <title>Who is Britain\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds biggest \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdcultural icon\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/who-is-britain2019s-biggest-2018cultural-icon2019</link>     <description>Shakespeare is the most famous British person for people abroad.</description>     <dc:date>2014-04-23T12:20:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/spotlight-on-arts-and-humanities/studying-a-music-degree">     <title>Studying a music degree</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/spotlight-on-arts-and-humanities/studying-a-music-degree</link>     <description>Want to study music at university? Read on to find out which course will hit the right notes. </description>     <dc:date>2014-04-22T13:30:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/win-ps1000-with-the-connell-guides-essay-competition">     <title>Win \ufffd\ufffd1000 with the Connell Guides Essay Competition</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/win-ps1000-with-the-connell-guides-essay-competition</link>     <description>The Connell Guides Essay Competition, judged by novelist William Boyd, asks which novel, play, or poem has made an impact on you.</description>     <dc:date>2014-02-12T14:17:43Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/careers-and-courses/career-profile-costume-designer">     <title>Career profile: Costume designer</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/careers-and-courses/career-profile-costume-designer</link>     <description>Costume designers design and create the clothes an actor wears, hepling to define the look of the character and the production.</description>     <dc:date>2014-02-07T00:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/careers-and-courses/career-profile-stage-manager">     <title>Career profile: Stage Manager</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/careers-and-courses/career-profile-stage-manager</link>     <description>Stage managers keep the theatre world turning. Find out how you can become a backstage star.</description>     <dc:date>2014-01-24T16:20:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/help-to-tell-the-story-of-world-war-i">     <title>Help to tell the story of World War I</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/help-to-tell-the-story-of-world-war-i</link>     <description>Operation War Diary needs you.</description>     <dc:date>2014-01-15T16:47:43Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/careers-and-courses/career-profile-archaeologist">     <title>Career profile: Archaeologist</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/careers-and-courses/career-profile-archaeologist</link>     <description>Find out how archaeologists uncover the past, and how you can get involved.</description>     <dc:date>2013-12-18T15:30:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/careers-and-courses/career-profile-archivist">     <title>Career profile: Archivist</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/careers-and-courses/career-profile-archivist</link>     <description>An archivist is someone who cares for materials that have significant historical or cultural value. Archivists are responsible for organizing collections of records or information and making them accessible to others.</description>     <dc:date>2013-12-05T16:25:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/careers-and-courses/career-profile-screenwriter">     <title>Career profile: Screenwriter</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/careers-and-courses/career-profile-screenwriter</link>     <description>Screenwriting is the act of producing a screenplay for television or film. A screenwriter is the person who researches, writes, and delivers the finished material. Screenwriters have to be adept storytellers, capable of capturing the interest and attention of the producer, director, cast, and crew of a production. </description>     <dc:date>2013-11-22T12:25:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/leonardo-da-vincis-strange-musical-instrument-comes-to-life">     <title>Leonardo da Vinci's strange musical instrument comes to life</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/leonardo-da-vincis-strange-musical-instrument-comes-to-life</link>     <description>A concert pianist has built a working version of an instrument invented by Leonardo da Vinci more than 500 years ago.</description>     <dc:date>2013-11-19T16:25:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/careers-and-courses/career-profile-choreographer">     <title>Career profile: Choreographer</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/careers-and-courses/career-profile-choreographer</link>     <description>Choreography is the art of creating dance or movement sequences. A choreographer is in charge planning a routine, or set of steps and movements, for a performer to execute during a musical number. </description>     <dc:date>2013-11-13T17:10:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/what-did-the-music-of-ancient-greece-sound-like-1">     <title>What did the music of Ancient Greece sound like?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/what-did-the-music-of-ancient-greece-sound-like-1</link>     <description>Armand D\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdAngour, a classics professor at Jesus College, is attempting to re-create the sounds of Ancient Greek music. </description>     <dc:date>2013-11-06T12:34:29Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/spotlight-on-arts-and-humanities/studying-classics">     <title>Studying a classics degree</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/spotlight-on-arts-and-humanities/studying-classics</link>     <description>Are you fascinated by the Ancient world, and how much influence it still has on our lives today? Do you love the idea of uncovering the deeply hidden past with the evidence that still remains? Then a classics degree may be for you. </description>     <dc:date>2013-10-21T08:00:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/why-studying-music-improves-your-brain">     <title>Why studying music improves your brain</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/why-studying-music-improves-your-brain</link>     <description>Learning a musical instrument helps people to stay focused and spot mistakes.</description>     <dc:date>2013-10-04T14:20:00Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/why-dont-ballet-dancers-get-dizzy">     <title>Why don't ballet dancers get dizzy?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/why-dont-ballet-dancers-get-dizzy</link>     <description>Ballet training might cause changes in a person\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds brain which helps them keep their balance.</description>     <dc:date>2013-09-30T15:15:56Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/are-classical-musicians-better-seen-than-heard">     <title>Are classical musicians better seen than heard?</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/are-classical-musicians-better-seen-than-heard</link>     <description>A winning performance depends more on how someone looks than sounds.</description>     <dc:date>2013-08-20T12:55:55Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/what-does-literally-mean"> has added a new definition of the word.</description>     <dc:date>2013-08-14T12:45:52Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/how-andy-warhol-is-making-art-from-beyond-the-grave">     <title>How Andy Warhol is making art from beyond the grave</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/how-andy-warhol-is-making-art-from-beyond-the-grave</link>     <description>The Warhol Museum has set up a live webcam at the artist\ufffd\ufffd\ufffds tombstone to mark his 85th birthday.</description>     <dc:date>2013-08-06T14:53:35Z</dc:date>   </item>   <item rdf:about="http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/get-ps500-for-your-arts-project-1">     <title>Get \ufffd\ufffd500 for your arts project</title>     <link>http://www.brightknowledge.org/knowledge-bank/arts-and-humanities/get-ps500-for-your-arts-project-1</link>     <description>The Tommy Fund and Ideas Tap are offering two bursaries of \ufffd\ufffd500 for young people hoping to kickstart projects in art, film, music or theatre.</description>     <dc:date>2013-08-02T13:41:24Z</dc:date>   </item> </rdf:RDF>
